column4: on a different note, in beryl, is it possible to bring back the "right click move to workspace X" functionality? draging windows to across screen is much less convieniuent
multi monitor setup = long distance to "edge og screen"
well, Beryl uses viewports instead of workspaces. There might be a way to do it, but it would work pretty different
the #beryl folks would know for sure, though
